data.what_is: Plumb5 is a platform for segment of one marketing which allows marketers to offer behavior based automation across the customer life-cycle in real-time. The Plumb5 platform  hosts a suite of apps comprising of web and mobile trackers, dynamic personalization widgets, email and social apps, community builders, data visualization and connectors for Commerce, CRM, POS and Telephony apps.
data.product_description: Plumb5 is a real-time customer life-cycle automation platform with built-in unified intelligencePlumb5 is a platform for segment of one marketing which allows marketers to offer behavior based automation across the customer life-cycle. Plumb5 personalization engine works for all customer touch-points. Our proprietary tagging methodology allows us to tag data irrespective of the touch-point system.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 10 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 10 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 12 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 11 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 11 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 18 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Based on 18 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 18 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 17 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Based on 21 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Based on 19 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Based on 13 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 13 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Based on 16 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: Based on 18 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Based on 18 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 18 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Based on 18 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 17 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 21 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 17 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Based on 15 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Based on 14 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Based on 11 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Based on 12 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Based on 12 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Based on 11 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Based on 12 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Based on 11 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 25 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Based on 24 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 18 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Based on 16 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Based on 16 Plumb5 reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

features.name: Data Enrichment
features.content: Uses external data sources to improve customer profiles.

features.name: Expandability
features.content: Can be updated to accept new sources and types of data.

features.name: Multiple Devices
features.content: Can engage with customers across any device with a consistent message.

features.name: Marketing Metrics
features.content: Provides analysis of marketing program ROI and efficiency.

features.name: Predictive Modeling
features.content: Predicts outcomes based on statistical models; can give insight to "what-if" scenarios.

features.name: Recommendation Engine
features.content: Uses artificial intelligence to provide suggestions based on desired outcomes.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Plumb5?
Love the technology, True segment of one platform. Various widgets allow real time engagement with your online customers and their ability to treat them as an individual. This brings in possibilities of executing multiple business use cases using the tool. The best of it is its ability to unify data from various sources and bring it on to one platform. Data is a very key aspect of this product as far as we have seen and some of our customers just loved it.

What do you dislike about Plumb5?
New products take time to spread its wings across the world. Very few people who can use the product wisely. This calls for P5 training and creating a lot more P5 certified partners and subject matter experts.

Recommendations to others considering Plumb5:
I would highly recommend this product to others. As a seasoned marketing person having worked on the very first Unity Mail to Lyris to Unica, I see merit in the product and its ability to unify data from various sources to one single platform.

What problems is Plumb5 solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have solved multiple problems using the solution. While for a few customers we have solved Lead Management, allocation and quicker time to response, while for others we have integrated with POS and bring on the data under one umbrella and for some we have solved personalised and real time engagement with online users. As a consultant we have advised customers to use this and the client responses has been amazing. This has really helped us provide more value to our customers at a low cost as compared to other products available in the market.

initial_reviews.review_title: Priority Funding Corporation Review of Plumb5
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Plumb5?
The functionality of the system is extremely user friendly.  Having the ability to create templates, segment the database, send the emails and track the success is well set up.  As a novice, I was able to learn the system quickly.  The Followup from Shubha has been excellent.  She is friendly, and listens to requests.

What do you dislike about Plumb5?
There are always teething issues with new systems.  We have had a few template issues over time, but these continue to be worked on and improved.

Recommendations to others considering Plumb5:
I you are seeking a complete emailing and social media system that will help track clients and multiple databases then you will be very pleased with Plumb5.

Shubha has been excellent at helping implement changes, and actually suggesting helpful strategies that will enhance success.

What problems is Plumb5 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Tracking the marketing to clients and increasing business from existing and new clients.

We have been able to understand where our business is coming from and implement new strategies to increase business in these areas.

We have also implemented strategies to use current website and social media to increase exposure

Great value for money specially for start ups and mid segment company. Compared to Omniture or Webtrend it covers almost features & Affordable Tool.
Real time web engagement is the feature I like the most because there is high chances of conversion when a lead/repeated lead is contacted in real time and ones web behaviour is right in front of a sales agent.
The tool has other features too like CRM, email marketing, Social look up etc.
When all the data is placed in one system and there is continues flow there is much to analyse data and lot more insights. Plumb5 allows to flow data with all features combined.

What do you dislike about Plumb5?
1. Customized dashboard/report is not possible with all possible filters.
2. Segmentation of data has to be improved specially for emails.
3. Great to see if SMS dashboard works.

What problems is Plumb5 solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Lead Nurturing and re-engagement
- ROI
- Data centric 7 structuring
- Understand social behaviour of visitor/potential lead
